home.subtitle: PRESTO-PsA is a simple, scalable tool capable of estimating the 1-year or 5-year risk of developing psoriatic arthritis (PsA) among individuals with psoriasis.
home.step1: Select the 1-year or 5-year risk calculators to estimate the risk of developing psoriatic arthritis within 1 year or 5 years.
home.step2: Enter the information based on personal or clinical data
home.step3: Click "Show My Risk" to calculate the 1-year or 5-year risk.

about.title: About PRESTO-PsA
about.subtitle: Prediction of Psoriatic Arthritis Tool
about.description:
Psoriatic arthritis (PsA) affects a significant portion of individuals with psoriasis, yet early identification remains a challenge in clinical practice. The PRESTO-PsA tool was developed as part of an ongoing research initiative to help bridge this gap by providing physicians with a simple, scalable method to estimate the risk of PsA development over 1-year or 5-year periods.

This app is designed to support clinical awareness and stimulate further investigation. By inputting patient information, users can generate a risk estimate based on validated prediction models. While the app does not provide diagnostic guidance or score interpretation at this stage, it serves as a valuable research tool to facilitate early risk recognition and prompt consideration for further evaluation or rheumatology referral.
about.disclaimer: Please note: PRESTO-PsA is intended for research and informational purposes only. It is not a clinical decision-making tool and should not be used to guide treatment. This app is intended for healthcare professionals only at this time.

feedback.title: Feedback Form
feedback.description: Please reach out to your healthcare provider for any medical concerns, inbox is monitored by technical team with no medical background. This is to be used for technical inquiries only
